original_title: The Spirit Is Willing But The Flesh Is Furry
overview: For the work The Spirit is Willing but the Flesh is Furry, Valentina Gal dove into the online subculture of Furry Fandom – people who like to wear cartoonish animal costumes and adopt a physical or virtual alter ego (a ‘fursona’) in the form of an anthropomorphic animal.
title: The Spirit Is Willing But The Flesh Is Furry
